text:
Matt, that's awesome thanks!
We're using blog posts tags to determine which filters should be shown and usable on a landing page.

So when we add or remove bog posts the landing page needs to rerender, but it does not. So the tags are unable to drive the filter feature unless we republish the page's code.
<@U067N2QCSUS>â€¦ notice this has been posted across multiple channels. Channel spamming is not allowed in this Slack.
